markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 5" pfs="Standard">
[Untwisting Iron Roots](/Spells.aspx?ID=1255)
<actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Earth" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=55" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 223

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Area** 10-foot emanation

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You manipulate the earth beneath your feet to throw your enemies off balance, leaving chunks of rock and rubble behind. Creatures within range take 2d6 bludgeoning damage, with a [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save; on a failed save, they also fall [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=31). The affected area becomes difficult terrain, but you can move through the difficult terrain normally.

---
**Heightened (+1)** The damage increases by 1d6.
name: Untwisting Iron Roots
